ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Whats the arguement?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, because BBB can be sung more often, and doesn t drain mana.  Which is why DDD should, if single-target, do a lot more damage than BBB does. BBB isn t
ygData.messageBody:
Well, because BBB can be sung more often, and doesn't drain mana. Which is why DDD should, if
single-target, do a lot more damage than BBB does.

BBB isn't resisted as much as you might expect, it seems to work about 60% of the time for me even against
big MOBs.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, <Silent Justice> Innoruuk


"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:

> > What would be the point of ever memming our 55 BBB (except maybe for
> > the stun effect) if DDD was made single target?
>
> i don't see a point to memming that song either. i can interrupt a caster
> with SoT, and if it is 55+ where SoT wouldn't work, then BBB is going to be
> resisted anyway.
>
> Shada
